citations.narrative:
Main Barn (back entrance): There is an area of peeling paint on the upper left side of the entrance. Surfaces of primary
enclosures should be kept in good repair to facilitate cleaning and to protect the animals. Measures must be taken to
ensure the surface of the wall remains in good repair to protect the animals from harm. Correct by November 14, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
Main Barn (back entrance): There is an area of peeling paint on the upper left side of the entrance. Surfaces of primary 
enclosures should be kept in good repair to facilitate cleaning and to protect the animals. Measures must be taken to 
ensure the surface of the wall remains in good repair to protect the animals from harm. Correct by November 14, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
